text: The Albania women's national basketball team represents the Albania in international women's basketball competitions. ==Competitions== ===Small Countries=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Year !width=28|Pos !width=28| !width=28| !width=28| |- bgcolor=silver | 1996 || 2nd || 5 || 4 || 1 |- bgcolor=gold | 2002 || 1st || 4 || 4 || 0 |- bgcolor=silver | 2008 || 2nd || 5 || 3 || 2 |- !colspan=2 align=left|Total !! 14 !! 11 !! 3 |} ===Mediterranean Games=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Year !Round !Position |-bgcolor=Gold | 1987||First Place||1st |- |} ==Roster== |} | valign="top" | ; Head coach * \---- ;Legend: *Club – describes last club as of 19 July 2015 *Age – describes age as of 19 July 2015 |} ==See also== * Albania women's national under-19 basketball team * Albania women's national under-17 basketball team * Albania women's national 3x3 team * Albania men's national basketball team ==External links== *Albanian Basketball Association (Official website) *Albanian Women National Team at eurobasket.com Category:Women's national basketball teams
